CustomField.formula:
IF( Registration__r.RecordType.DeveloperName = "Child Performer Services" || Registration__r.RecordType.DeveloperName = "Entertainment Work" ,
(Registration__r.Registration_Account__r.Mailing_Street__c +" "+ Registration__r.Registration_Account__r.Mailing_Address_Line_2__c + BR() + Registration__r.Registration_Account__r.Mailing_City__c+" "+ TEXT(Registration__r.Registration_Account__r.Mailing_State__c)+" "+ Registration__r.Registration_Account__r.Mailing_Zip_Code__c) ,
(Registration__r.Mailing_Address_Line_1__c+" "+ Registration__r.Mailing_Address_Line_2__c+ BR() + Registration__r.Mailing_City__c+" "+ TEXT(Registration__r.Mailing_State__c)+" "+ Registration__r.Mailing_Postal_Code__c) )
CustomField.label: Address
